item.title: 因涉嫌袭击越南骑手，"螃蟹号 "正接受菲律宾调查
item.description: 菲律宾监管机构正在调查一名越南妇女通过 Grab 控股有限公司（Grab Holdings Ltd.）订车时涉嫌抢劫和性侵犯一案。【原文：Philippine regulators are investigating the alleged robbery and sexual assault of a Vietnamese woman who booked a car ride via Grab Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 通胀数字解决了辩论无法解决的问题
item.description:
美联储现在不太可能大幅降息，以抵消特朗普的糟糕表现，因为市场正在寻求 明确性。【原文：

The Fed is unlikely to make a jumbo cut now, counterbalancing Trump’s poor performance as markets seek clarity.

】

item.title: 石油交易商面临没有中国牛市因素的新世界
item.description: 二十年来，中国首次不再是推动全球原油需求的引擎，这对本周在新加坡参加 APPEC 石油会议的许多贸易商和高管来说，是一个未知的领域。【原文：For the first time in two decades, China no longer looks like the engine driving global crude demand, which is uncharted waters for many of the traders and executives that gathered for the APPEC oil conference in Singapore this week.】

item.title: 印度 2024 年最大 IPO 吸引了 390 亿美元的惊人投标
item.description: 印度最大的影子贷款公司的住房贷款部门首次公开售股就引起了巨大反响，凸显了投资者对印度上市的持续热情。【原文：The home-loan unit of India’s largest shadow lender drew a blockbuster response for its share-sale debut, highlighting continued investor exuberance over listings in the nation.】

item.title: HDFC 正与全球银行洽谈出售 10 亿美元贷款事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的私营贷款机构 HDFC 银行有限公司正在与几家全球性银行洽谈，希望出售多达 840 亿卢比（10 亿美元）的贷款，以减少其信贷规模，使其与存款更加匹配。【原文：HDFC Bank Ltd., India’s largest private sector lender, is in talks with several global banks to offload as much as 84 billion rupees ($1 billion) in loans to reduce its credit book and bring it more in line with deposits, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大科技公司的顺风顺水即将结束
item.description:
欧盟法院对苹果和谷歌的裁决标志着一个对科技巨头实施更快速监管的新时代。【原文：

EU court rulings against Apple and Google mark a new era for of swifter regulation for tech giants.

】

item.title: IEEFA 称欧洲液化天然气峰值加剧资产搁浅风险
item.description: 据一家能源智库称，欧洲很可能已经达到了液化天然气消费的峰值，但仍在继续建设进口终端和相关基础设施，这增加了这些工程闲置和成为搁浅资产的风险。【原文：Europe has likely reached peak consumption of liquefied natural gas yet continues building import terminals and related infrastructure, raising the risk that those works sit idle and become stranded assets, according to an energy think tank.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚将在欧洲央行和美联储行动前恢复宽松政策：决策指南
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行预测通胀将进一步放缓，而欧洲和美国的政策制定者预计将降低利率，因此在上个月暂停货币宽松政策后，塞尔维亚准备恢复货币宽松政策。【原文：Serbia is poised to resume monetary easing after a pause last month as the central bank forecasts inflation to slow further and European and US policymakers are expected to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将降息但对未来之路保持警惕
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将再次降低利率，但在通胀尚未完全消除的情况下，将对进一步行动的步伐和程度守口如瓶。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to lower interest rates again, but will remain tight-lipped on the pace and extent of further action with inflation not yet fully defeated.】

item.title: 印度考虑出台新规遏制小型 IPO 热潮带来的风险
item.description: 据一位参与讨论的人士透露，印度证券监管机构正在考虑加强对即将上市的微型公司的监管，包括监督其资金使用情况，并对商业银行家实施更严格的尽职调查准则。【原文：India’s securities regulator is considering tighter oversight on micro-cap firms going public, including monitoring the use of their funds and imposing stricter due diligence guidelines for merchant bankers, according to a person involved in the discussions.】

item.title: 印度 2024 年最大规模首次公开募股需求火爆
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 瞄准亚洲 "普通储蓄者"，阿波罗筹款规模不断扩大
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. said the evolving needs of “average savers” in Asia is helping drive fundraising and growth for its global wealth business.】

item.title: 亚洲基金成立联盟，帮助向越南输送数十亿资金
item.description: 几家地区私募股权公司联合起来成立了一个越南联盟，旨在未来十年内促进向这个东南亚国家投资 350 亿美元。【原文：Several regional private equity firms have banded together to establish a Vietnamese alliance, aiming to facilitate $35 billion of investment into the Southeast Asian country over the next decade.】

item.title: 中国要求汽车制造商将关键电动汽车技术留在国内
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国已强烈建议其汽车制造商确保先进的电动汽车技术留在中国，即使他们在世界各地建厂，以逃避对中国出口产品征收惩罚性关税。【原文：China has strongly advised its carmakers to make sure advanced electric vehicle technology stays in the country, people familiar with the matter said, even as they build factories around the world to escape punitive tariffs on Chinese exports.】

item.title: 家电巨头美的香港首秀为上市复兴奠定基调
item.description: 香港三年多来最大规模的上市活动是对该市举步维艰的首次公开募股市场的一次重大考验。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest listing in more than three years presents a major test for the city’s struggling market for initial public offerings.】

item.title: 中国扣留投资银行家并收走护照
item.description: 中国正在加大对其 8700 名投资银行家大军的打击力度。【原文：China is turning up the heat on its army of 8,700 investment bankers.】

item.title: 日元走软，日经 225 指数上涨逾 3%，止住 7 天跌势
item.description: 由于日元升值暂停，科技公司和汽车制造商等出口商受到提振，日本股市上扬，日经 225 指数上涨超过 3%。【原文：Japanese stocks advanced, with the Nikkei 225 Stock Average gaining more than 3%, as a pause in the yen’s strengthening gave a boost to exporters such as technology companies and automakers.】

item.title: 谷歌在反垄断打击前几乎削减广告交易费用
item.description: 在美国司法部的反垄断审判中，谷歌前高管作证说，八年前，在网站开发出一种绕过谷歌工具提高在线广告收入的方法后，谷歌曾讨论过削减其广告交易费用。【原文：Eight years ago, Google debated slashing the fees for its advertising exchange — the highest in the industry — after websites developed a way to boost online ad revenue while bypassing the company’s tools, former executives testified as part of a US Justice Department antitrust trial.】

item.title: 红海危机导致运价飙升，亚洲成为赢家和输家
item.description: 亚洲上半年的盈利情况表明，红海危机的连锁反应将继续使生产出口产品的公司付出高昂的代价，而运输产品的公司则从运费上涨中获益。【原文：First-half earnings in Asia showed how the ripple effects of the Red Sea crisis will continue to be costly for companies that make goods for export, while those that transport their wares benefit from higher freight rates.】

item.title: 紧缩之墙扼杀中国扩大需求的努力
item.description: 随着中国经济增长目标所面临的威胁与日俱增，北京的财政部门负责人正在测试通过鼓励需求来提振经济的新方法，以打破长期以来的惯例。【原文：Finance chiefs in Beijing are testing new ways to boost the economy by encouraging demand, breaking with long-established practice as threats to the country’s growth target mount.】

item.title: 通胀数据浇灭美联储大幅减息的希望，黄金保持跌势
item.description: 一份报告显示，8 月份美国基本通胀率回升，削弱了对美联储下周大幅降息的预期。【原文：Gold steadied after a small decline following a report that showed underlying US inflation picked up in August, weakening expectations for an outsized interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve next week.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好科技股拉动大盘。债券市场结束了对美联储大幅降息的幻想。争购英伟达（Nvidia）芯片让一些客户感到沮丧。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Tech stocks lift the broader market. Bond market ends flirtation with big Fed rate cut. The scramble for Nvidia chips has left some customers frustrated. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 飓风 "弗朗辛 "引发担忧，原油涨后趋稳
item.description: 由于飓风 "弗朗辛 "袭击了墨西哥湾的主要原油产区，石油价格在创下两周多来的最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest gain in more than two weeks as Hurricane Francine hit key crude-producing regions in the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 全球资金涌入东南亚股市，美联储中枢发挥作用
item.description: 东南亚股票已巩固了其作为资金经理们为美联储政策中枢定位的最爱的投资品种的地位。【原文：Southeast Asian equities have cemented their position as a favorite play of money managers positioning for the Federal Reserve’s policy pivot.】

item.title: 中国火锅连锁店计划向美国扩张，以摆脱国内市场的低迷
item.description: 中国火锅连锁店海底捞表示，未来几年将重点进一步拓展国外成熟市场，尤其是美国市场，努力在国内食客减少消费的情况下吸引新顾客。【原文：Chinese hot pot chain Haidilao said it will focus on expanding further into established foreign markets in the coming years, notably the US, working to draw new customers as diners at home pull back on spending.】

item.title: 交易员对美联储减息立场坚定，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在科技股反弹提振华尔街之后，亚洲股市早盘上涨，交易商将目光从美国核心通胀率的上升转向下周即将实施的降息。【原文：Stocks in Asia were headed for early gains after a tech rally lifted Wall Street as traders looked beyond elevated core US inflation to imminent rate cuts next week.】

item.title: 压裂为何仍是争议的 "避雷针
item.description: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在竞选白宫总统时改变了对水力压裂法的立场，这使水力压裂法再次成为公众关注的焦点。这项开创性的油气开采技术使美国实现了能源独立，但多年来一直是争议的导火索。许多环保主义者因其对水、碳排放和地震的影响而反对它，而支持者则认为它是美国经济发展的关键。【原文：Hydraulic fracturing, or fracking, has been thrust back into the public spotlight as Vice President Kamala Harris’ change of position on it comes under scrutiny given her campaign for the White House. The groundbreaking technique for oil and gas extraction that vaulted the US to energy independence has for years been a lightning rod for controversy. Many environmentalists oppose it because of its impact on water, carbon emissions and earthquakes, while proponents defend it as key to the US econo】

item.title: SpaceX 的小对手飙升 1300%。现在是卫星发射
item.description: AST SpaceMobile 公司是一家希望与太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）竞争的小型电信公司，在短短六个月内从 2 美元飙升至 28 美元，成为今年全球最热门的股票之一。【原文：AST SpaceMobile Inc., the tiny telecom company that wants to compete with SpaceX, has become one of the hottest stocks in the world this year after soaring from $2 to $28 in just six months.】

item.title: 银行为 Janney 的收购定价 14 亿美元杠杆贷款
item.description: 在交易条款收紧后，周三定价的 14 亿美元杠杆贷款方案将为 KKR & Co.收购资金管理公司 Janney Montgomery Scott 提供资金。【原文：A $1.4 billion leveraged-loan package priced Wednesday to help fund KKR & Co.’s buyout of money manager Janney Montgomery Scott, after terms on the deal were tightened.】
